description:
Provides athletes with a palatable shot of carbohydrate blend (70-80% maltodextrin and 30-20% fructose). The mix is easy to digest and gives you a long-lasting surge of energy.

  • Includes electrolytes to ensure hydration, antioxidants to stave off muscle tissue damage, and amino acids to delay muscle fatigue
  • Ingredients: maltodextrin, water, fructose, leucine, sea salt, natural flavour, potassium citrate, sodium citrate, ascorbic acid (vitamin C), citric acid, calcium carbonate, valine, histidine, green tea extract, (contains caffeine) sodium benzoate (preservative), potassium sorbate (preservative), D-alpha-tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E), gellan gum, fumaric acid, isoleucine, pectin powder, chamomile extract, ginger extract
name: GU Salted Caramel Gel
